entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 5:15 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 early this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
